title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering (Revised)
description: Define the project scope, objectives, and detailed requirements for the FrackingWaterRecycler system. This includes creating user stories, wireframes, functional specifications, and technical specifications. Engage stakeholders, subject matter experts, and potential users in the requirements gathering process to ensure comprehensive understanding of the system's functionalities.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall architecture of the FrackingWaterRecycler system, including water treatment processes, hardware components, software systems, data flow, and integration points. Consider scalability, fault tolerance, security, and maintainability aspects. Include a detailed design document that covers all the mentioned aspects and provides a clear roadmap for implementation. The design should also address the environmental impact of the system, energy efficiency, and cost-effectiveness. The design document should be structured in a way that it can be easily understood by both technical and non-technical stakeholders. Additionally, consider implementing modularity for easy maintenance, optimizing the system for minimum water loss, and exploring potential partnerships or collaborations with eco-friendly technology providers to improve the sustainability of the system.

title: Database Design - Reworked
description: Update and optimize the database schema and structure for efficient storage, retrieval, and management of data related to the water treatment processes, system operations, user information, and audit trails. Incorporate the latest best practices in database design, and ensure scalability, reliability, and security considerations are met. Review and refactor existing queries for performance improvements.

title: User Interface Design (UI/UX) - Updated
description: Design the user interface and user experience for the FrackingWaterRecycler system, including the dashboards, monitoring tools, control panels, and flowcharts depicting user experience flows. The design should prioritize responsive design principles, accessibility (WCAG 2.1 Level AA compliance), and ease of use. Also, consider integrating real-time data visualization and alerts to ensure efficient operation.

title: Backend Development
description: Implement the backend systems, including the water treatment process control, data processing, and integration with other systems.

title: Frontend Development
description: Implement the user interface components, dashboards, and monitoring tools for the FrackingWaterRecycler system.

title: Integration and Testing
description: Integrate the backend and frontend components, and perform comprehensive testing of the FrackingWaterRecycler system.

title: Security Auditing
description: Conduct security audits and vulnerability assessments to ensure the FrackingWaterRecycler system is secure and compliant with industry standards.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the infrastructure and deployment processes for the FrackingWaterRecycler system, including continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines.

title: Documentation and Training
description: Develop comprehensive documentation, user manuals, and training materials for the FrackingWaterRecycler system.
